#summary SuperSearch homepage.

== Introduction ==

Free, fast and efficient multi-engine search tool, with nearly 60 search engines and a detailed search categories. Main functions are as follows:

    * A keyword input, multiple search engines at the same time, improve search efficiency and reduce the time to solve the problem
    * Built-in support for nearly 60 search engines, and a detailed breakdown
    * Support for custom search engine configuration, the user can add their own needs engine
    * Support full-screen mode, increase the display space for search results
    * Save keywords
    * Free: no registration, no functional limitations
    * Fast: multi-threaded concurrent execution, speed up the search speed
    * Multi-language support (Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean)
